LanguageData.UTI.preferOverlaytt: When opening a mod-page, will prefer to launch it in the Steam overlay instead of the default browser
LanguageData.UTI.waitingUnsub: Waiting for steam to process unsubscription
LanguageData.UTI.waitingSub: Waiting for steam to process subscription
LanguageData.UTI.onlyRelevanttt: Will not show replacements that do not support the installed version of the game
LanguageData.UTI.alwaysShowtt: Will show the button to open the replacement-window even if there are no replacements found
LanguageData.UTI.author: By:
LanguageData.UTI.notUpdated: NOTE: Replacement does not support this version of RimWorld ({0})
LanguageData.UTI.activeModsChanged: Active mods changed, opening mod-config to enable and sort before restart
LanguageData.UTI.activatingMods: Adding new mods to the active mod-list
LanguageData.UTI.incompatibility: {0} is incompatible with an active mod: {0}
LanguageData.UTI.modlistChanged: Modlist updated, will require a restart when closing this window
LanguageData.UTI.reallyAbort: Mods are being replaced, are you sure you what to abort the process?
LanguageData.UTI.alreadyReplacing: A mod is being replaced, please wait until completed
LanguageData.UTI.stillWaiting: Waiting for mod to download, will time out after one minute
LanguageData.UTI.replaceMultipleModsActive:
Replace {0} mods?
NOTE: Since one or more mods are currently active, a restart will be triggered when you close the mod-window after sorting the new mods.
LanguageData.UTI.allModstt: Will check all installed mods for replacements instead of only the currently loaded
LanguageData.UTI.steamMod: Mod is loaded from the Steam mod-folder
LanguageData.UTI.localMod: Mod is loaded from the local mod-folder
LanguageData.UTI.cantUnsubscribe: {0} is a local mod, skipping unsubscribing
